bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: John O. Peters (1936-) is the author of several books on Virginia and Richmond history.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Research files, 2010-2013, of John O. Peters (1936-) of Richmond, Virginia, for his book FROM MARSHALL TO MOUSSAOUI: FEDERAL JUSTICE IN THE EASTERN DISTRICT OF VIRGINIA. Papers include articles, clippings, emails, judicial opinions, manuscript drafts, notes, and other records documenting the history of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Virginia.
